page.title: 12SURVEYS
page.content: { FARM WORK SURVEY A survey was conducted amongst 60 children at Beaupre Community Primary School to find out how many parents and relations of children at the school had work connected with farming. The survey was conducted on June 5th 1985. Our results showed that 21 children had mothers involved in farm work whilst 8 fathers worked on farms. 30 of the children themselves earned money from fruit picking in the summer months. {GAME POPULARITY SURVEY A survey was conducted amongst 60 children in Classes 1 and 2 at Beaupre Community Primary School Outwell to establish the popularity of certain games and activities. Football was found to be the most popular whilst netball was the least popular.
